website_summaries.verdict: Silicone inner padding and a rotating design allows these hooks to quickly and easily slide out of the way when you have passengers.
pros: Open design is easy to install
Silicone padding provides a snug fit and safeguards headrest poles from scratches and scrapes
cons: These hooks are somewhat short and might not extend far enough on wider backrests

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this! They fit securely! I like that I can still put my purse on the front passenger seat but it won’t go flying on the floor if I stop short. I immediately ordered another one for my family! If it isn’t durable, I’ll update my review since they just came in today.
customer_reviews.author: Caf211

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Purses and Hats!
customer_reviews.text: I never put my purse on the ground and with a baby, the back seat gets so full of all his stuff so I wanted something that kept my purse easily accessible while keeping it off of the floor. These hooks are awesome! They fit my SUV and since I only needed one I put a couple in my husband's truck for his golf hat and bike helmet which he always keeps in the backseat. He loved that his hat doesn't get smashed and he's not always moving his helmet around. They're exactly what I needed and shipped quickly, overall would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MDanks

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the ladies happy!
customer_reviews.text: The Car Headrest Hooks install fast and easy, and are very simple to figure out. I installed one on each seat's headrest, so the ladies have a convenient spot to hang their purses. No more purses on the (sometimes) dirty floor, or stuck in laps on a long ride. My wife, when driving alone, swings the hook on the front passenger seat forward and hangs her bag there. The Toplus Car Headrest Hooks are something that someone should've thought about a long time ago. Now that someone has thought about them, I'm glad we have some installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM SOLVED!  My wife now has a place to hang her purse!  FINALLY!  Nice, smart design
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my life? Nice way to maintain some level of organization in the car - my wife is always putting her purse on the console and blocking access to controls and even the cup holder - these immediately solved that problem not in one car but two! Fit perfectly and are engineering well to hold a reasonable amount weight. Nice, smart design.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheelinva

customer_reviews.title: Organized my "Horse Show" vehicle !
customer_reviews.text: These were slightly loose on the headrest poles of my 2012 Tahoe which made me worry a bit because I wanted to really use them with varying sized and weights of bags. They work GREAT ! I can keep the tall books hanging from one hook and the helmet on the other behind my daughter's seat and my laptop bag and lunch bag behind my seat. We have saddles and show clothes and extra horse items all over the back of the car, but now we can always find the boots and helmet first, and my laptop bag doesn't slide around to possibly damage my laptop and our lunch doesn't get smashed underneath anything. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the front, unsafe to use in the back.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set for my front seat headrests and liked them well enough to order an additional set for the back seats. However, when I put them in place, I am unable to snap the headrest down in place so that it is secure. Were I to leave it that way, I would be endangering the lives of my passengers should we be in an accident. I would have returned them but found, after the shipping deduction, I would only receive $2.00 and some change. So I will give them to someone who can use them on their front seats and search for a set that is not quite as high to use on my back seat head rests.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Works well but
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and won't leave indentation marks on the seat leather which many others do. It also works well for holding bags in the back of the seat, but in all honesty, I prefer my handbag to hang in the front for easy access. I do turn it forward facing but this makes it a bit trickier to hang a handbag because the headrest is in the way. I suppose one could raise the passenger headrest if you don't have passengers frequently. Overall, I've been pretty happy with it over the past couple of weeks and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tropigal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for purses
customer_reviews.text: If your purse normally sits on the seat next to you and a passenger is there instead, then where do you put your purse? It is always an issue. This is the cure! They simply slide on but with a rubber 'gasket' they hold very firm. They will not harm the metal on the headrest or the seat in anyway. Being a four pack, you can be the passenger or driver and still put your purse handy. Purse, shopping bags, to go bags. It could be used for children in the back seat to use. They are a real gift and addition to my car!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but not as easy as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of these. But they turn easily into the headset and when you’re trying to put in a toddler and hang your bag they are just not as easy as they look. They turn and then I usually have to put my bag down turn the clip and then I can clip my bag on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I do wish they stuck out just a litttle more because sometimes it is hard to get my purse to catch on it. ALSO, other peeps commenting that you only receive a pair of two, not four, is correct. They maybe need to word their title a little better because it says pack of 4, but you assume a pair would be considered one pack. You only get 4 actual hanger things. However, this product does its job and has eliminated my frustration of my purse flying all over the place when I drive.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Hensen

customer_reviews.title: Do what they claim
customer_reviews.text: Actually, this was for my wife, who is always fumbling for her purse while in the car. The hook fits nicely on the rod for the headrest and because of the foam inserts is nice and tight. These are surprisingly well made and very sturdy. I put one on the driver and passenger side of both our cars. Now she can locate her purse no matter which car or seat she uses. A nice addition to the car!
customer_reviews.author: KW1K

customer_reviews.title: Great features in this must-have car accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rubber inserts that hold the hooks in place. Another brand I had tried would get bumped off all the time. These are a perfect snug fit for my Honda Pilot and even turn in and stay put when not in use so you can use them in the front passenger seat without having to take on and off when someone is going to sit in the seat. They can be used to hang things in front of or behind the seat, too! So useful for purses, grocery bags, store returns, diaper bags, backpacks etc!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Not a universal fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on positive reviews without realization that these would not fit my vehicle (2016 Cadillac XTS) I went for the upgraded expectation of "leather" gadget rather than the metal or plastic versions. My mistake. Not only did it not fit my headrest but the "hook" is very shallow and would not hold most of my 2-strap purses or 2-handle briefcase. I returned these and ordered one of each of the hard plastic and metal variety....both of which I love. I use the hard plastic (black) on the passenger seat for my purse and the metal on the backside to hold a brief case or grocery bag or even dry cleaning .
customer_reviews.author: BMS

customer_reviews.title: Love these hooks!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are great and just what I was looking for! I was looking for something to hold my bags up in the front seat because my back seat is busy with little people and some things are not appropriate for the trunk like delicate groceries and take out and this does the trick. These hooks are great and I just turn them in when not in use. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Samika

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't work, spins all the time and won't hold my purse straps
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hook to hang my purse or bags from!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to use to hang my purse from, These were suggested to me so I thought, sure, why not. They clip on very easily to my 2015 Dodge caravan head rest post. Black matches my interior, they clip on the post so it doesn't bother the passenger at all. Can be easily reached for when entering or exiting my vehicle. Fits all straps sized that I tried, even more than one at a time. Cool little crazy device that I didn't know I needed! I gave one away to my best friend, she will be purchasing more she said . Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE these things!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest invention since sliced bread! Not only keeps things off the floor; keeps them from rolling around loose; also keeps things in easy reach of the passenger. On long trips, we fill a bag with books; snacks; drinks, etc., and hang it on one of the hooks behind the driver's seat, and the passenger can reach everything easily without even having to take off the seat belt. This is our second set.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Hesse

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Do not work on either of my vehicles, they pop off very easy
customer_reviews.author: AZChristina

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always having a problem putting my handbag somewhere when driving. Well, not a problem anymore! These hooks are just what was needed. I can hang my purse while I'm driving, and if I need it quickly, it's right there within arm's length. It's also good for traveling. We went to NC and took our grandson and he loved having a place to hang his bag of goodies. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these after being on a road trip with a friend that had this same thing but in a different brand and price. So while we were on the road, Amazon shopping I go. Found these and thought, that it had to be too good to be true that I get 4 for this great price but what can it hurt. I put one in each of cars and love that I always have a place to put my purse without worrying it spilling over all the time. The only thing I have found, is that if you have a wide strap, it tends to not want to stay as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: What a great little product. I purchased these so I could hang my purse and umbrella up without having to worry about them turning over, spilling or shifting back and forth. But I found another use too. I purchase a couple of plants and didn’t want them to spill dirt in the back of my vehicle, so I was able to just hook the plastic bag containing them onto both of the hooks behind my seat. Perfect ride home!
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to access your items ....no more handbag on seat or floor
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and it is sturdy stable...and easy to install. Got my yesterday and immediately installed started using. My box had 4 in it. Great price for 4 ..fantastic product.. I LOVE IT. Hung my handbag on it perfect. It stayed in place on my errand run...was easy to access. So nice not to worry about my handbag turning over. Thank you for this great invention. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It doesn't stay attached to my headrest supports
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a sturdy and durable product, but I only gave it two stars because I don't find it very functional. It seemed like it clipped right onto the headrest support, but it keeps popping off in my car and is more of a pain to get it to stay on in the direction I want it to sit. I'll try another type of product. Unfortuntely, I think I realized it doesn't work for me too late to try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thicker purse straps but still handy
customer_reviews.text: My purse has a 1.25 inch strap and it is too big to hang on the hook unless I want it to end up folding. Not going to happen since it is a designer purse. I will use the hooks for groceries and other things if I remember, but had gotten the hooks primarily so my purse would stop falling over in the passenger seat and be convenient to dig into when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: lseng

customer_reviews.title: Great car hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks! They really come in handy for bags, groceries, my purse etc. The 4 pack is a good deal. They fit snug and don't move around. They aren't pointy or too big and can fold inwards for safety so your back seat passengers don't poke themselves. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 in each car and by looking at the hooks, you would think.. "This is going to BREAK". So far we haven't had any issues with these. They simply hook onto the headrest and you are set. I have a 20 - 25lb laptop bag and the hook holds it, no problem. I would recommend this for the laptop bag to ANYONE but for the ladies, this is a no-brainer.. You can still reach in your bag at a stop light if you need something.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Junk, cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: 5stars for easy to install because it’s a one motion thing. However, the opening is so big I’m not sure it will hold anything without falling off. Shipping took three times as long as it should have and by the time it got here and I put it on I felt utterly stupid for ordering it and wished I would have just gone to Target and bought something from there. Don’t waste the money or time in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had other car seat hooks..
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had other car seat hooks. The kind that dangles from the head rest. They always got knocked off or my kid got hooked on it while getting out of the car for school. And eventually they got knocked off and stepped on/broken and I replaced them with this. It’s so much better. 2 seconds to snap in, but strong enough for heavy backpacks. And they fold in so they are out of the way. Best of all, if someone brushes against them, they don’t fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen-NJ

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with how well these headrest hooks stayed in place. They snapped onto my headrest very well, but they were not secure and rotated around whenever the car drove or when something was put on the hook. It is possible that it’s the fault of my car’s headrest, but it did not stay secure in either one of the cars I tried (2003 RAV4 and 2005 Highlander). Pros: has potential to open up space in the back of your car Cons: hooks swiveled around the headrest too easily
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great hooks, does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Hey, this does hold weight and it is a God send. I drive with my bag in my passenger seat for easy access but when I have someone in the car with me, either they hold my bag or I drive with it in my lap. I hate having to go to the back seat and reach for it if I don't have too. So, with this I just reach behind the passenger seat and wahla! My bag. With groceries, its the same deal, just make sure the plastic handles on the grocer bags don't break b/c this won't.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Watson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my car and purse
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work because they are more stylish then others. But the grip part was too big for my headrest rods so they sat loosely. I could live with that part, but it still worked, but my purse straps were too thick for the very narrow hooks. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough
customer_reviews.text: These look good and they do seem sturdy but they aren’t long enough for use in front seat. I wanted something easy to use when I am driving. When I put these on the front passenger seat the part that sticks out is only 1/2” towards the front where I want to hang my purse :(. Would work better if you want to swing it around And use it from the back seat
customer_reviews.author: K. Garland

customer_reviews.title: tried both now
customer_reviews.text: and both companies are equal. Probably one company makes all of these. These are life savers!! hook them to the poles on your headrest and hang your purse, small backpack and other things to secure them while driving. no more purse falling into the floorboard.
customer_reviews.author: Pro Makeup Artist4Life

customer_reviews.title: These come in handy, worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: I like these more than I thought I would. I bought them figuring for the price it was worth trying, and they're worth it. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because if it does NOT have something on it, sometimes it can get bumped off so you have to get it off the floor of the car, but it doesn't happen often, and not a big deal. I've used it to hang my purse (which can be pretty heavy sometimes) and it holds it very well. Nice addition to create a little more space to put something without taking up any space itself. Worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Depends what you need
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my work tote in place on my seat, A little shallow for large handle bags to get both straps on and short for headrests to bring all the way down. Otherwise fits snug and stays in place on headrest bars and works well for appropriately sized bags!
customer_reviews.author: N.Carter

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty seat hook/hanger
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy just like the display pic shows. My one complaint is that the headrest is not able to lower over the hook, so the headrest does not go completely down into the default position. If you're using over the back/rear passenger seat it might not affect anything, or anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jackie Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory
customer_reviews.text: My purse was always tipping over, spilling out the contents and I hated setting my LV on the floor of the car. With this hook, I hang it off the front or back of the seat and its secure, easy to get to, and out of the way if I have a passenger. I bought one for each member of the family.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver for Expensive Bags
customer_reviews.text: I don't like setting my designer bags anywhere where they might get dirty. These hooks have been so convenient and handy to have in our cars. I don't have to set my bag in the back seat where I can't reach or on the floor where it might get dirty. I keep two in my car for when either I'm driving or my husband is. I keep one in his car for when I'm riding with him. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purse holder
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. My purse can't fall the the floor anymore and I can use the other one for a small trash bag. When not in use I just turn them inward and they are out of the way. That was one of the main reasons i choose these. They are small enough to tuck away. cushioned material will not damage the head rest. I can't believe it took me this long to get some
customer_reviews.author: Star P.

customer_reviews.title: These will be stocking stuffers for Christmas...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for all my family members for Christmas. Kept one for myself, and have been using it. Easy to install, and great for keeping my bag in the front seat (when no passengers!) so it doesn't fall forward when stopping, dumping contents all over the floor! Only one drawback...wish it was just a tad longer so it would be easier to get my handbag handle on the hook, but can still manage it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent for groceries and purses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could have access to my purse while driving. I love that I can turn them either way- sometimes I use them for hanging grocery bags in the back seat but mostly for my purse. Now I don't have my purse toppling onto the front passenger floorboard where I can't reach it. This keeps it close by.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: These hugs are super cool and really versatile
customer_reviews.text: These hugs are super cool and really versatile. My Two children throw their school bags and swim bags all over the car. I love that this was a four pack so I can put two on the chairs from the front row and 2 on the chairs in the middle row. None of our bags are on the floor and I really really like this concept. I was concerned that it might look unsightly in the car but it's great how they Tuckaway under the headrest when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CdnMum

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: For me it should have been a little longer. I have trouble getting the purse strap on the hook, due to it being so close to the back of the seat. But I will keep it and use it, its just not as easy as it could be. I drive a truck, maybe the seats are wider, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Alice J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for jackets and book bags!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these so my two kids have a place to hang their jackets and book bag so they can stop stepping on them. These worked perfect! They are very sturdy, super easy to install and I like that they can be pushed in to be parallel with the headrest. I highly recommend especially if you have kids in school.
customer_reviews.author: Riles Mom

customer_reviews.title: I was excited, until I tried them.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in the deals page and said "wow I could really use this". I travel with my son and our bags often and thought this would be a great way to stay organized. They slip off and my bags end up on floor after one turn. Not impressed and do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: A good buy and useful too
customer_reviews.text: I love these little headrest hooks! They are small but sturdy with no sharp edges. These hooks are simple to install and tuck away under the headrest when not being used. They don’t flop around on their own, like some metal hooks I had in the past, but stay in place. A good deal for the money, as four come in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected around the head rest post, but once I put any weight on it the hook sagged down and started to slip off the head rest post. This issue didn't happen if I lowered the headrest all the way down, but that didn't work with my seating position.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Works great, plan to purchase more for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy having my purse stay put. Twists to the front when I don't have a passenger or dogs with me, or twists to the back when I do. No longer have the purse and contents falling all over the floor when I come to a sudden stop. I plan to purchase some more for Christmas gifts for nieces and sisters.
customer_reviews.author: a mother

customer_reviews.title: Easy mornings!
customer_reviews.text: These make school drop offs a breeze! I hang my kids water bottles and lunchboxes on these and they can grab them and jump right out. They both have two for this purpose on both front headrests. I can’t tell that they’re there, meaning I cannot feel them behind me. They come off easily and can be tucked underneath the headrest. They’re sturdy. Both my boys have 24oz stainless steel water bottles that are filled to the brim every morning and there is no sign of weakness to these hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay on. I don't expect perfection, but I keep finding them on the floor. It's frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Crumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Strong but Moves
customer_reviews.text: They don’t stay in place well. They spin around. I have to imagine the posts are standard’ish. I have a pro master van. They are pretty strong though, so as long as you have enough weight on them, they stay stationary’ish
customer_reviews.author: Mondo

customer_reviews.title: ... wish I thought of it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the handiest things! No more spilled purses. So easy to install, just slip them on the headrest bar that's it. Your ready to roll with your purse or shopping bag, whatever hanging on the hook. What a clever solution...wish I thought of it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: work great, as long as your headrest posts are big enough
customer_reviews.text: Useful and supposedly "adjustable". My problem is that my CRV headrest posts are smaller than the opening for the clips. This causes the hooks to be very loosely attached to the headrest and they swing around too freely and fall off. They work much better in my hubby's Acura TLX
customer_reviews.author: The Wild OliveTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: Auto headrest hooks
customer_reviews.text: The headrest hooks are exactly as advertised. They are a great convenience as I no longer have to have my purse fly off the seat, reusable grocery bags are always in the car, passengers in the back seat have a place to put purses. It is just one of the things that makes life a little easier. Auto manufactures seem never to think of a place for lady's purses.
customer_reviews.author: Dorcas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and really makes necessities accessible
customer_reviews.text: Small things in Cars make a big difference in comfort and accessibility . I own a minivan and go for long drives a lot with my family. With a baby , you always need to have things handy and ready in front of you. It is useful to hang snacks bag, small bags, plastic bags. When you are not using, you can just slide inside.
customer_reviews.author: Narayanan Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t fit my head rest post snugly so they raddled and shook around when I drove. Not something that I want right by my head! I drive a newer Chevy so I would assume all the head rests re the same. I returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Work well. Don't stay in place though.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Work as expected. If you're concerned about the aesthetic of them staying in a certain position, you will not be happy. They swing pretty loosely. Doesn't bother me though. I use these every day! No more bags rolling around freely in the vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Package

customer_reviews.title: GREAT gift item. Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I give these as gifts on a regular basis. People don’t know how much they need them until they have them. Perfect for hanging up whatever you need to not slide around in your car. For me it was my purse and grocery bags mostly. Since they swivel you can put the bags hanging off of the front seat or off the back of the front seat. Passengers who ride in the back also love to hang their bags on then product. It’s wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Vboca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got these. I have an equinox and needed more organization in there. I use it mostly for my purse and they are VERY sturdy since my purse is pretty heavy. They hold it real good. The grippers inside them hold onto the bars where the headrest is and they don't fall off at all so far. Plus they are easy to move around if needed without falling off or breaking. I'm really glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: acoleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but......
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, but didn't work with my car seats. The hook did not extend out far enough to use the hook. I guess the seats of my car have too much padding. Wish it extended out farther.
customer_reviews.author: Upstate Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A must for every car
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I did before without my hooks. Good for grocery's and plants or any bags. The best use for me is the my pocketbook is no longer flying on the floor sliding of the leather seats. Very happy with my headrest hooks.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit
customer_reviews.text: The hooks didn’t work for me because they are too short to hang much of anything on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Quick hook
customer_reviews.text: Works great to hang purses, book bag, cleaners, sports jacket, stethoscope and so much more. No time wasting trying to find the vehicle manufacturer’s hook and trying to hold it down while you place the hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris young

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Although I ended up returning this product at no fault to the item. It didn't fit the Durango head rest area as we have tvs in the back of seat it did fit our other car. But unfortunately I need it to work in both vehicles so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice ... but
customer_reviews.text: The length of the hook is a little too short when rotated to the front and is actually under the headrest. It works nicely turned around toward the back seats and goes on the headrest good. I have an older Honda Civic and I guess the headrest must be a little more to the back of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Keyes

customer_reviews.title: This is great! Buy them for every car!
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. My purse used to fall off the seat all the time, scattering everything into the floor. It also comes in handy when someone is sitting in the passenger side. Just rotate the hook to the back and the bag will hang on the back of the passengers seat.
customer_reviews.author: Aned

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Car Headrest Hooks
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality headrest hooks need for car. I have a baby and my wife needs bags and other baby stuff needs to be hanged. This are perfect hooks needed for hanging bags and other stuff in the car headrest. These are very easy to install and use. We have hanged small to big size bags and there was no issue at all. They are able to bear good amount of weight. Perfect space saver and very usable car gadget. I would definitely recommend others.
customer_reviews.author: SNR

customer_reviews.title: Very useful storage idea for purses or other bags
customer_reviews.text: These headrest hooks are light but very durable. Easily holds much heavier bags. They clip snugly on some car headrests than others but doesn't interfere with their ability to hold heavy objects.
customer_reviews.author: BelyjParus

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have a shoulder injury and it was uncomfortable for me to reach in the back floorboard to get my purse. This hook makes retrieving my purse so much more comfortable and frees up my passenger seat. PERFECT!!!! It's sturdy, looks nice and pivots. I've got one in every car.
customer_reviews.author: Momof5

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that these wouldn’t hold up, but they do! Have been using them for a couple months now and I place my super heavy purse and lunch bag on them and they hold everything in place. It’s so nice not having to worry about my purse tipping over and spilling all over the floor anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My only complaint is that they don't stay firm. They never fall off but with a few bumps from the kids getting in and out, they get moved little by little until they pop off. Not a design flaw and they have rubber grippy parts to keep them in place. They have certainly made a number of things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth GB

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Was always putting my purse/bag in between the seats and it would slip or fall all over the place. Got these and put them in every car. Can just reach back and grab my bag or things inside it. Very strong as I have put some heavy weight onto it. Hang grocery bags, car garbage bags and other things on it. Fit perfectly on three different vehicles from a sedan to an SUV. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: aquadolly130

customer_reviews.title: They can be a little loose, but are fine for most uses.
customer_reviews.text: I do like these, but wish they were all one color. Having the inside a lighter color (outside is black) makes it look tacky. I use it behind passenger seat for trash bag - easier to reach than behind me and no place for it in the front. If I have a front seat passenger, I put my purse in the back also.
customer_reviews.author: James Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! They fit on a 16 4Runner headrest post. The hooks are kind of short for the depth of the seat, but you can still use them just the same. These help me so much, now I don't have to put my bags in the back seat and if I need to reach them they are much closer.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Kirby/Chris Teasley

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these
customer_reviews.text: So far these meet my expectations nicely. They are easy to pop on and off, they swivel out of the way when not in use, and they seem sturdy enough for my use. Certainly not going to hang a carpenter's bag from them but they will help me while I mom.
customer_reviews.author: Daniell J

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave almost all of them away as Christmas presents. So far, not one recipient has guessed what they are for, and it’s a hoot watching them trying to figure it out. Thank you for the laughs. They look sturdy and should be durable, only time will tell on that one.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Where have these been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: I love these hooks so much, I ordered more! They are great in our minivan, for both myself and my son. I use one to hang my handbag on, freeing up the passenger seat. And my son uses one to hang his jacket & backpack on when getting in after school, rather than tossing them inside the vehicle! They’re great for shopping bags to hang on behind the 3rd row over the truck area, creating even more cargo space. So many uses. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Smart idea, less than ideal execution
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are alright but there’s no clasp or anything to keep them from moving and sliding around. My headrests don’t lock in my seat so once the headrests raise any, the hooks won’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Practical, Nearly Saves Space!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great addition to my car. From now on this will be a necessary fixture in any car I own. It keeps my purse off the seat..no more rolling around or keeping it on the floor. It can hang bags & tired. It is even sturdy enough to hang clothing. Affordable!
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Nifty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now, these are just nifty! Finally a place to hand the kids backpacks and coats so they don't get walked on in the floor board. However, they will NOT work on a very heavy backpack. They fit fairly loosely on both cars I've used them on, so if something is too heavy they pop off.
customer_reviews.author: L.E.W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have these, you should. I hang everything I can think of that I need to on these. I have an edge (2018)band they fit great on the headrests.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great car hooks for hanging backpacks
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect car hooks for the kids backpacks. They snap on the headrest prongs and don’t fall off easily. They hold the kids backpacks well and they swivel out of the way when not in use (they swivel and tuck under the headrest and out of the way).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife so she can hang her purse in the car. It is sturdy and able to hold the weight. She needed to bring her headrest up a bit to make space for this, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Inches

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hook!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, sturdy, lightweight and perfect size. All my friends love them, to not have your purse fall and dump on the floor while driving is great! I hang my jacket and purse for easy access. I will purchase more for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thick with hook that is not curved enough
customer_reviews.text: Too thick — so if headrest is down all the way it won’t fit. Also, article will slip off easily because hook part is not curved up enough. Was going to us it for my purse and in backseat for kids headphones to get them off the floor
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I needed this until I stumbled across this. WOW! These things are awesome. They really hold a lot of weight and help with the groceries not falling. I'm ordering more now so that I don't miss out on this great deal. Very sturdy, great material and ingenius design!
customer_reviews.author: John Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Worked in my SUV, holds purse well
customer_reviews.text: These fit in my 2016 Nissan Murano, wasn't sure if they would. Holds my purse behind the passenger seat and I use them in the cargo area on the back of the backseats to hold my reusable shopping bags in place. Seem pretty sturdy, but they are plastic so I probably wouldn't put more than 30 lbs on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best headrest hanger I've found
customer_reviews.text: If your hang ups don't make you happy, try this hang up and you will be pleased with your choice. It's easy to install, extremely tough, and it won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Len Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: They work great in my Honda. The Chrysler headrest is thinner, so it feels like it’s not going to hold, but it’s actually working out well. Didn’t think I needed this until I got it, and now I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my Nissan Armada. They look like they were meant to be there and so functional! I can hang my purse in the front seat or behind it. Haven't lost anything to a tipped over purse since I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect item to keep my purse from falling off the passenger seat. With bucket seats, there is no room for my purse if I have a passenger. This hook is perfect and easy to reach when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kay L Hoersten

customer_reviews.title: These are very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to install and use. I have a pretty heavy purse (small, but looks can be deceiving) and the hook works great. As you can see in the picture, two hooks on one headrest works just fine. I have a 2016 Honda Pilot, and we take my car on road trips all the time. The hooks will definitely come in handy then.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thai

customer_reviews.title: Functional and substantial
customer_reviews.text: I just "installed" two of these in my vehicle and I am so happy to have somewhere to hang those silly plastic bags from the grocery store or my purse when someone else is in the car with me! I like them so much that I am ordering some more for my sister and sister in law!
customer_reviews.author: Marquette Mary

customer_reviews.title: These headrest hooks do not extend out far enough when ...
customer_reviews.text: These headrest hooks do not extend out far enough when the headrest is in the lowest position. Even with the headrest in a higher position the straps on my purse do not lay flat. They may work well enough on a different car (mine is a Lexus RX350) or with a purse with rounded, narrow straps. I replaced metal hooks because they were tearing my purse straps but these are barely functional in holding my purse.
customer_reviews.author: kscallie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  for use or non use
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product to hang items on but the best is that when people enter or exit car that you can turn them in under headrest so no one gets hurt and when you want to use them you just turn out to hang item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set of 4-So Practical!
customer_reviews.text: These headrest car hooks are so convenient in my Tucson. I have a back pack-style purse and it sits perfectly on the hook in the passenger side while driving. I gave one to my aunt for her new car. They're also ideal to carry a plastic shopping bag home. You can come up with alot more uses! Inexpensive but so practical!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie53

customer_reviews.title: Swing out of the way when not in use. VERY handy!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they swing out of the way. They are good for a purse, a jacket, hats, bags - whatever. And while in use, someone can still sit in the seat behind . Definitely recommend! Bought these for my dad and his golf hats. But I plan on ordering a set for my own car.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I used to keep my purse on the seat and it would usually fall spilling out the contents. No more of that in my car. These are perfect for keeping my purse from spilling and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping bags of floor, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. Easy to install and use. Keeps my purse and bags off the floor and not rolling around. Easy to rotate out of the way if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gadgets!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have these been all my life?? I love these things!! I wish they weren't quite as thick as they are, my purse straps are kind of thick, but they still work GREAT!! :) I use them facing forward or backward! They hold my purse, my jacket, shopping bags, etc. Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sarafina

product_meta.title: Toplus 4 PACK Car Headrest Hooks - Vehicle Universal Car Organizer Car Back Seat Headrest Hanger Holder Hook for Bag Purse Cloth Grocery, Black- Coloured
product_meta.description:
Features: 

Organize back seat: help to hook coat, hats, bags, bottles instead of messily placing them on the seat. 

Easy to install:No need to take down the headrest, easily snap the hook without adhesives or tools. 

Durable material:Hard to break, good bearing capacity. Extra silicone prevents scratches and slips when using. 

Rotatable design:Rotate the hook out when use, rotate hook inward when not use, very convenient to use. 

Specifications 

Material: ABS + Silicone 

Size: 4 x 2 x 1 inches 

Net Weight: 1oz 

Fit Pole Diameter: 0.4-0.6 inches 

Package Included 

4 Packs Vehicle Headrest Hooks 

Satisfying Guarantee 

ONE YEAR replacement and refund warranty. Please contact us timely when you meet questions or don’t satisfy our products. We will solve your problems within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: ❤Space Saving: The hook installed on the car headrest pole helps to hang clothes, handbags, umbrellas, water bottles, kid's toys, baby supplies and so on. Save seat space and prevent bags falling off when turning.Organizes back seat clutter and opens up seat, floor and leg room.

❤Easy Installation: Upgraded side opening design for easy and fast installation. No need adhesives or tools; no need disassemble the headrest. Directly snap the hook onto the pole of the headrest due to side opening design, suitable for poles with 0.4” to 0.6” diameter.
❤Flexible Rotation: The hooks can be rotated 360 degrees horizontally after installing. You can hide the hook when not use, ensures safe and maintain original interior space and appearance.

❤Premium Material: The car hangers are made from super durable ABS and silicone rubber, ensuring eco-friendly and long time to use. The silicone rubber part makes hooks firmly stay on the headrest pole.
❤Contain 4 Hooks: Set of 4, Great deal, meet your multiple uses. They are practical automotive gadgets, so buy them as gifts for your family and friends. We will provide ONE YEAR warranty for you.
